name: Project Princess: The Rising Sun
description:
Project Princess occurred during the summer of 2016 in a week sprint at the University of Southern California's Introduction to Game Design Summer Program. Four students, including myself, worked together to create this and we were rewarded "Best Art" and "Most Polished" out of all of the groups. We put many hours into the making of this project, so you can only imagine what we're capable of now years later.

The .ZIP includes the executable, the original PowerPoint presentation, and the source code.

Other developers are Skylar Kelley (Jampakdd), Brian Keshish, and Finn Carney.
